# Boulder Toss (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 2]]

**BoXM:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 135

You draw the power of the mountains into you, gaining a short surge of strength and skill that allows you to hurl rocks like a giant. You may hurl any suitable object, as if you had the [[S3.1R-S - Universal Monster Rules R-S (Bestiary 6 Apx)|rock throwing]] ability, up to one size category smaller than yourself. When hurling, you gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.

The hurled rock does 1d6+1 1/2 times your total Strength bonus and has a range increment of 40 ft. At 5th level, and every four levels afterward, the enhancement bonus to Strength increases by +2 and the range increment increases by 40 ft. At 9th level, increase the damage die to 1d8. At 13th level, you can hurl rocks the same size category as yourself, increasing the damage dice

to 2d6.
